commentText: Tests that the args are set literally.
codeText: @Test_    @DirtiesContext_    public void testOverrideArgs() {_        final String[] args = {"-version", "classpath:c:/program files/test/"}__        producerTemplate.send(new Processor() {__            public void process(Exchange exchange) throws Exception {_                exchange.getIn().setBody("noinput")__                exchange.getIn().setHeader(EXEC_COMMAND_ARGS, Arrays.asList(args))__            }_        })__        List<String> commandArgs = execCommandExecutorMock.lastCommandResult.getCommand().getArgs()___        assertEquals(args[0], commandArgs.get(0))__        assertEquals(args[1], commandArgs.get(1))__    }
